AND HJ_DONG_CD = #{par_hj_dong}

SELECT A.REPAIR_NO , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(B.REPAIR_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD'), 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS REPAIR_DATE , B.REPAIR_DESC , F_GY_DATA_CODE_NM('03', A.PROGRESS_STATUS) AS PROGRESS_NAME , F_GY_DATA_CODE_NM('01', A.TROUBLE_CD) AS TROUBLE_NAME , F_GY_DATA_CODE_NM('12', A.DONG) AS DONG_NM , F_GY_DATA_CODE_NM('03', A.TROUBLE_TYPE) AS TROUBLE_TYPE_NM FROM GY_LIGHT_REPAIR A, GY_LIGHT_REPAIR_PART B WHERE A.REPAIR_NO=B.REPAIR_NO AND A.LIGHT_NO = #{light_no} ORDER BY A.REPAIR_NO DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM GY_LIGHT WHERE TRIM(LIGHT_NO) = TRIM(#{light_no})

SELECT A.INOUT_DAY AS "날짜" ,COALESCE((SELECT DATA_CODE_NAME FROM GY_CODE B WHERE CODE_TYPE='24' AND A.PART_CD=B.DATA_CODE AND B.YEAR=A.YEAR) ,'') AS "품명" ,COALESCE((SELECT STANDARD FROM GY_CODE B WHERE CODE_TYPE='24' AND A.PART_CD=B.DATA_CODE AND B.YEAR=A.YEAR) ,'') AS "규격" ,COALESCE((SELECT UNIT FROM GY_CODE B WHERE CODE_TYPE='24' AND A.PART_CD=B.DATA_CODE AND B.YEAR=A.YEAR) ,'') AS "단위" ,CASE WHEN COMPANY_ID = 'admin' AND INOUT_FLAG IN('1','4') THEN INOUT_CNT WHEN COMPANY_ID != 'admin' AND INOUT_FLAG NOT IN('3','5') THEN INOUT_CNT ELSE 0 END AS "입고" ,CASE WHEN COMPANY_ID = 'admin' AND INOUT_FLAG NOT IN ('1','4') THEN INOUT_CNT WHEN COMPANY_ID != 'admin' AND INOUT_FLAG IN('3','5') THEN INOUT_CNT ELSE 0 END AS "출고" ,CASE WHEN COMPANY_ID = 'admin' AND INOUT_FLAG IN('1','4') THEN INOUT_CNT WHEN COMPANY_ID != 'admin' AND INOUT_FLAG NOT IN('3','5') THEN INOUT_CNT ELSE 0 END - CASE WHEN COMPANY_ID = 'admin' AND INOUT_FLAG NOT IN ('1','4') THEN INOUT_CNT WHEN COMPANY_ID != 'admin' AND INOUT_FLAG IN('3','5') THEN INOUT_CNT ELSE 0 END AS "잔고" ,COALESCE((SELECT COM_NAME FROM GY_MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID=COMPANY_ID) ,'') AS "시공업체" , COALESCE(CASE WHEN COMPANY_ID = 'admin' AND INOUT_FLAG = '1' THEN '[외부(구매)입고]' WHEN COMPANY_ID = 'admin' AND INOUT_FLAG = '2' THEN '[외부(판매)출고]' WHEN COMPANY_ID = 'admin' AND INOUT_FLAG = '3' THEN '[업체출고]' WHEN COMPANY_ID = 'admin' AND INOUT_FLAG = '4' THEN '[업체반납]' WHEN COMPANY_ID = 'admin' AND INOUT_FLAG = '5' THEN '[보수처리]' WHEN COMPANY_ID != 'admin' AND INOUT_FLAG = '3' THEN '[구청입고]' WHEN COMPANY_ID != 'admin' AND INOUT_FLAG = '4' THEN '[구청반납]' WHEN COMPANY_ID != 'admin' AND INOUT_FLAG = '5' THEN '[보수처리]' ELSE '' END||' '||A.BIGO ,'') AS "비고" FROM GY_LIGHT_PART A WHERE YEAR LIKE #{st_yy} AND COMP_NM LIKE '%'||#{company_id} AND PART_CD LIKE '%'||#{material_cd} AND INOUT_DAY BETWEEN replace(#{sDate2},'-','') AND replace(#{eDate2},'-','') ORDER BY INOUT_DAY, PART_CD, LAST_UPDATE

SELECT A.INOUT_DAY AS "날짜" ,COALESCE((SELECT DATA_CODE_NAME FROM GY_CODE B WHERE CODE_TYPE='24' AND A.PART_CD=B.DATA_CODE AND B.YEAR=A.YEAR) ,'') AS "품명" ,COALESCE((SELECT STANDARD FROM GY_CODE B WHERE CODE_TYPE='24' AND A.PART_CD=B.DATA_CODE AND B.YEAR=A.YEAR) ,'') AS "규격" ,CASE WHEN COMPANY_ID = 'admin' AND INOUT_FLAG IN('1','4') THEN INOUT_CNT WHEN COMPANY_ID != 'admin' AND INOUT_FLAG NOT IN('3','5') THEN INOUT_CNT ELSE 0 END AS "입고" ,CASE WHEN COMPANY_ID = 'admin' AND INOUT_FLAG NOT IN ('1','4') THEN INOUT_CNT WHEN COMPANY_ID != 'admin' AND INOUT_FLAG IN('3','5') THEN INOUT_CNT ELSE 0 END AS "출고" ,CASE WHEN COMPANY_ID = 'admin' AND INOUT_FLAG IN('1','4') THEN INOUT_CNT WHEN COMPANY_ID != 'admin' AND INOUT_FLAG NOT IN('3','5') THEN INOUT_CNT ELSE 0 END - CASE WHEN COMPANY_ID = 'admin' AND INOUT_FLAG NOT IN ('1','4') THEN INOUT_CNT WHEN COMPANY_ID != 'admin' AND INOUT_FLAG IN('3','5') THEN INOUT_CNT ELSE 0 END AS "잔고" ,COALESCE((SELECT MEMBER_NAME FROM GY_MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID=COMPANY_ID) ,'') AS "시공업체" ,A.REPAIR_NO AS "접수번호" , COALESCE(CASE WHEN COMPANY_ID = 'admin' AND INOUT_FLAG = '1' THEN '[외부(구매)입고]' WHEN COMPANY_ID = 'admin' AND INOUT_FLAG = '2' THEN '[외부(판매)출고]' WHEN COMPANY_ID = 'admin' AND INOUT_FLAG = '3' THEN '[업체출고]' WHEN COMPANY_ID = 'admin' AND INOUT_FLAG = '4' THEN '[업체반납]' WHEN COMPANY_ID = 'admin' AND INOUT_FLAG = '5' THEN '[보수처리]' WHEN COMPANY_ID != 'admin' AND INOUT_FLAG = '3' THEN '[구청입고]' WHEN COMPANY_ID != 'admin' AND INOUT_FLAG = '4' THEN '[구청반납]' WHEN COMPANY_ID != 'admin' AND INOUT_FLAG = '5' THEN '[보수처리]' ELSE '' END||' '||A.BIGO ,'') AS "비고" FROM GY_LIGHT_PART A WHERE YEAR LIKE #{st_yy} AND COMP_NM LIKE '%'||#{company_id} AND PART_CD LIKE '%'||#{material_cd} AND INOUT_FLAG = '5' AND INOUT_DAY BETWEEN replace(#{sDate2},'-','') AND replace(#{eDate2},'-','') ORDER BY INOUT_DAY, PART_CD, LAST_UPDATE
